text: For a limited time, Apple is offering new Apple Card users a special sign up bonus through Nike. Now through June 15th, users can receive $150 in cash back after spending over $150 on Nike purchases in the first 30 days of account opening. This stacks on top of the limited time 6% cash back offer that started earlier this month. If you’re a big Nike shopper, you’re in luck! With this new Apple Card offer, you can essentially pick up $150 in Nike gear for free if you sign up through this link. This offer has been advertised across social media in the past week, and is not a targeted offer – unlike previous Apple Card sign up bonus offers. Apple Card typically comes with no sign up bonus (other than the $75 referral offer), so every Apple Card welcome offer is worth talking about. As mentioned prior, this combines with the 6% cash back on Nike offer, which is also running through June 15th – on up to $500 of purchases. You do have a few weeks to decide on this one, but I’d certainly say this is one of the better Apple Card offers, especially if you wanted to spend at Nike anyways. html:
For a limited time, Apple is offering new Apple Card users a special sign up bonus through Nike. Now through June 15th, users can receive $150 in cash back after spending over $150 on Nike purchases in the first 30 days of account opening.

This stacks on top of the limited time 6% cash back offer that started earlier this month.

If you’re a big Nike shopper, you’re in luck! With this new Apple Card offer, you can essentially pick up $150 in Nike gear for free if you sign up through this link.

This offer has been advertised across social media in the past week, and is not a targeted offer – unlike previous Apple Card sign up bonus offers. Apple Card typically comes with no sign up bonus (other than the $75 referral offer), so every Apple Card welcome offer is worth talking about.

As mentioned prior, this combines with the 6% cash back on Nike offer, which is also running through June 15th – on up to $500 of purchases.

You do have a few weeks to decide on this one, but I’d certainly say this is one of the better Apple Card offers, especially if you wanted to spend at Nike anyways.

My favorite Apple accessory recommendations:

  • Anker 25K Compact Power Bank with retractable cable
  • MOFT Magnetic Wallet Stand, fits up to 3 cards
  • AirTag 4-pack (on sale for 20% off!)
  • Anker MagSafe 2-in-1 Wireless Charging Stand with Qi2
  • AirPods Pro 2 (USB-C)
  • SanDisk Extreme 2TB USB-C SSD, up to 1050MB/s
  • Aulumu Vegan Leather Case for iPhone 16 Pro
